title: $:/plugins/custom/s3-uploader
name: S3 Uploader
description: S3 Lazy Uploader backed by Rust
author: fiercex

tiddlers.title: $:/plugins/custom/s3-uploader/ui-modal
tiddlers.subtitle: Confirm S3 Upload
tiddlers.footer: <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink">Cancel</$button><$button message="tm-s3-confirm-upload" class="tc-btn-big-green" actions="<$action-sendmessage $message='tm-close-tiddler'/>">Import to S3</$button>
